{{cpp/ranges/chunk_by_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_by_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr value_type operator*() const;
}}

Returns the current element in the {{tt|chunk_by_view}}.

Equivalent to: {{box|{{c/core|return ranges::subrange(}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}}{{c/core|,}}{{nbspt}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}}{{c/core|)}}}}.

Before the call to this operator {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} must not be equal to {{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}}, otherwise the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element.
